biotools.summary:
Platform based on Artificial Intelligence Neural Network.
Suggest the most probable gene (protein) based on deep learning on million of scientific papers.
It also link the input+output to many free research tools to understand what the neural network suggested and why.

bioschemas.name: GeneRecommender
